name: cometd
description: A implementation of the CometD client library as an ES6 module.

scripts.build:dist: mkdir dist && browserify src/index.js --standalone CometD --outfile dist/cometd.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.build:lib: mkdir lib && babel src --out-dir lib --presets es2015
scripts.prepublish: npm run build:dist && npm run build:lib

author: seansfkelley@gmail.com
